description:
Implementacja systemu Programmatic SEO dla BuzzRank.

## Dokumenty:
- **Playbook:** https://maverick.creativerebels.pl/buzzrank-pseo-playbook.md
- **Keywords & Prompts:** https://maverick.creativerebels.pl/buzzrank-pseo-keywords-batch1.md
- **Implementation Plan:** https://maverick.creativerebels.pl/buzzrank-pseo-implementation-plan.md
- **Review Notes:** https://maverick.creativerebels.pl/buzzrank-pseo-review-notes.md

## Scope:
- 10 glossary pages (/glossary/[slug])
- 5 comparison pages (/compare/[slug])
- 3 persona pages (/for/[slug])
- 3 integration pages (/integrations/[slug])

## Tech Requirements:
- Dynamic routes for each content type
- Page templates with schema markup (FAQ, HowTo, Product)
- Markdown content storage
- Auto-sitemap update
- Core Web Vitals <2.5s LCP

## Questions for you:
1. Content storage: Markdown vs DB?
2. Can we extend existing blog or need new setup?
3. BuzzRank webhook available for auto-publish?

Est. 3-4 days for infrastructure, then we generate content via BuzzRank.
title: ðŸš€ BuzzRank pSEO Implementation - 21 pages Batch 1

description:
Found during tech audit 2026-02-02:

1. **Missing admin auth** in `/api/admin/stripe-transactions` - no role verification!
2. **Missing permission check** in `/api/deletePersona` - unauthorized delete risk
3. **Jest broken** - tests dont work

See full report: `reports/buzzgen-tech-audit-2026-02-02.md`
